keyPolicies.policyDescription: Dave has pledged that if elected, he will vote against any attempt to increase university fees. The Lib Dems are committed to scrapping fees.
Dave Radcliffe and local residents have welcomed the new anti-scratch paths in Selly Oak Park.
Dave joined the student Wardens and local residents in December to plant thousands of daffodil bulbs across Selly Oak.
Dave Radcliffe has advocated plans to repaint rusty cast iron road signs in Selly Oak.
Dave Radcliffe has ensured that there are two Environmental Wardens to tackle graffiti, and joined local residents in a litter drive.
Funds to purchase more bulk rubbish bins for Bournbrook, backed by Dave and fellow Lib Dem.
Cllrs Dave Radcliffe and Alistair Dow inspiring others to join in.

leaflet.personalStatement: Only Dave and the Lib Dems will deliver the real change that the residents of Selly Oak deserve.

endorsements.endorsement: Dave and the Lib Dems offer a fair future for our kids. That's why we're voting Lib Dem.
Labour lied in 2001 when they said they wouldn't increase university fees. Dave will vote to scrap fees.
Only Dave and the Lib Dems will deliver the real change that the residents of Selly Oak deserve.
The old parties have failed us for too long. I'm now backing Dave and the Lib Dems to work for us in Selly Oak.
